languages.text: {n}Застыв, Паскаль молча взирает на труп {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}херетека{/g}. Наконец он глухо произносит:{/n} "Я... заберу его {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}нейрокогитатор{/g}. Информация должна быть изучена с целью дополнения катехизиса эксплуатации и обслуживания".

traits.locale_text: {n}Застыв, Паскаль молча взирает на труп {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}херетека{/g}. Наконец он глухо произносит:{/n} "Я... заберу его {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}нейро-когитатор{/g}. Информация должна быть изучена с целью дополнения катехизиса эксплуатации и обслуживания".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal stands motionless as he stares at the {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}'s corpse. After a long silence, he finally says in a hollow voice,{/n} "I... I am taking his neural {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The data contained within must be analysed to supplement the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

The data contained within must be analysed in order to supplement the Catechism of Operation and Maintenance."

languages.text: {n}パスカルは静止したまま立ち尽くし、{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}異端技術{/g}の死骸を見ている。長い沈黙の後、ついに彼はうつろな声で告げた。{/n}「自分…自分は彼の神経{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}を持っていきます。内部のデータは整備と操作の要理を補足するために解析しなくてはなりません」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stands motionless as he stares at the {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}'s corpse. After a long silence, he finally says in a hollow voice,{/n} "I... I am taking his neural {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The data contained within must be analysed to supplement the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは静止したまま立ち尽くし、{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}異端技術{/g}の死骸を見ている。長い沈黙の後、ついに彼はうつろな声で告げた。{/n}「自分…自分は彼の神経{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}考算機{/g}を持っていきます。内部のデータは整備と操作の要理を補足するために解析しなくてはなりません」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡一动不动地站在原地，凝视着{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}异教{/g}成员的尸体。他沉默了很久之后，终于以空洞的声音开了口。{/n}“我……我准备取走他的神经{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}沉思者{/g}。我必须对其中包含的数据进行分析，用以完善《操作与维护原理》。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stands motionless as he stares at the {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}'s corpse. After a long silence, he finally says in a hollow voice,{/n} "I... I am taking his neural {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The data contained within must be analysed to supplement the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡一动不动地站在原地，凝视着{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}异教{/g}成员的尸体。他沉默了很久之后，终于以空洞的声音开了口。{/n}“我……我准备取走他的神经{g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}思考器{/g}。我必须对其中包含的数据进行分析，用以完善《操作与维护原理》。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal steht bewegungslos da und starrt auf den Leichnam des {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Häretekten{/g}. Nach einer langen Stille sagt er mit hohler Stimme:{/n} "Ich ... ich nehme diesen neuralen {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} mit. Seine Daten müssen analysiert und dem Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung zugeführt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stands motionless as he stares at the {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}'s corpse. After a long silence, he finally says in a hollow voice,{/n} "I... I am taking his neural {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The data contained within must be analysed to supplement the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal steht bewegungslos da und starrt auf den Leichnam des {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}Häretekten{/g}. Nach einer langen Stille sagt er mit hohler Stimme:{/n} "Ich ... ich nehme diesen neuralen {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}Cogitator{/g} mit. Seine Daten müssen analysiert und dem Katechismus von Betrieb und Wartung zugeführt werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Immobile, Pasqal contemple le cadavre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}hérétek{/g}. Après un long silence, il se décide enfin à prendre la parole d'une voix caverneuse :{/n} « Je... Je vais récupérer son {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} neural. Les données qu'il contient doivent être analysées afin de compléter le Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stands motionless as he stares at the {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}'s corpse. After a long silence, he finally says in a hollow voice,{/n} "I... I am taking his neural {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The data contained within must be analysed to supplement the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Immobile, Pasqal contemple le cadavre de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}hérétek{/g}. Après un long silence, il se décide enfin à prendre la parole d'une voix caverneuse :{/n} « Je... Je vais récupérer son {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitateur{/g} neural. Les données qu'il contient doivent être analysées afin de compléter le Catéchisme des Opérations et de la Maintenance. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal está inmóvil, contemplando el cadáver del {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}. Tras un largo silencio, por fin habla con voz apagada.{/n} «Voy a... extirparle el {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitador{/g} neural. Los datos que contiene deben analizarse para complementar el Catequismo de Operación y Mantenimiento».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stands motionless as he stares at the {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}'s corpse. After a long silence, he finally says in a hollow voice,{/n} "I... I am taking his neural {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The data contained within must be analysed to supplement the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."

Los datos que contiene deben analizarse para complementar el Catequismo de Operación y Mantenimiento».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}tekâfirin{/g} cesedine bakar hâlde bir süre hareketsiz kalıyor. Uzun bir sessizliğin ardından hissiz bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ben... Onun nöral {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}kavramsayarını{/g} alıyorum. İçinde bulunan veriler, Kutsal Faaliyet ve Bakım İlmihâli'ne katkı yapmaları için analiz edilmeli."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stands motionless as he stares at the {g|Encyclopedia:Heretek}heretek{/g}'s corpse. After a long silence, he finally says in a hollow voice,{/n} "I... I am taking his neural {g|Encyclopedia:Cogitator}cogitator{/g}. The data contained within must be analysed to supplement the Catechism of Maintenance and Operation."
